name: Stellation
description:
**Notice: Server disconnected due to cost + no one playing**

**Thank you for checking this out!**

Use the mouse to guide your light around the play area, and interact with other players from around the world! Travel to the edges of the screen to change colour, and form bonds with those closest to you.

This is my first attempt at any game networking, as in, I started learning it when the 48-hour challenge started. The server should be able to hold up to 5000 players, but you may see performance issues on your machine before it reaches that point!
